fruity.name: Fruity
fruity.summary: Bright, juicy, and playful — perfect for everyday wear and morning energy.

floral.name: Floral
floral.summary: Soft, elegant, and inviting — ideal for close encounters and gentle impressions.

woody.name: Woody
woody.summary: Clean, composed, and structured — understated yet enduring in charm.

oriental.name: Oriental
oriental.summary: Warm, rich, and layered — captivating in the evening and formal occasions.
